tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bioenergy_compliance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN,
    sustainability_standard VARCHAR(100),
    last_inspection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE bioregulatory_compliance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name TEXT,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Bioenergy_Regulations(
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Regulation TEXT,
  Compliance_Status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Sustainability_Standards(
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Standard_Name TEXT,
  Certification_Status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Bioenergy_Tracking(
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Tracking_Number TEXT,
  Quantity INT,
  Compliance_Status BOOLEAN
)
